content: I committed several hours ago, but the CI build is still "waiting for agent" @Josh Mandel @Grahame Grieve ?
Taking a look -- This used to happen sporadically but has not happened in last several months
Looks like Grahame has a stalled build too. Hmm.
I'm not at my computer right now but will dig in when I'm able

OK, I'm still not sure what happened but I updated the agent on our build VM and things are moving again. Please ping me again if you see any issues or instability; we can bring all kinds of resources to bear :-)
